longBusinessSummary: Life Insurance Corporation of India provides life insurance products in India, Fiji, Mauritius, and the United Kingdom. It offers insurance plans, including endowment, whole life, term insurance plans, money back, and term assurance plans, as well as riders comprising accidental death and disability benefit, critical illness benefit, and premium waiver benefit riders. The company also provides pension, unit linked, micro insurance, withdrawal, and health plans, as well as various group schemes. Life Insurance Corporation of India was incorporated in 1956 and is based in Mumbai, India.
